name: AVAudioSessionDataSourceDescription
desc: An object that defines a data source for an audio input or output, giving information such as the source’s name, location, and orientation.

items.name: var dataSourceID: NSNumber
items.desc: The system-assigned identifier for the data source.

items.name: var dataSourceName: String
items.desc: A human-readable name for the data source.

items.name: var location: AVAudioSession.Location?
items.desc: The location of the data source on the device.

items.name: struct AVAudioSession.Location
items.desc: Constants that describe the location of the data source on device.

items.name: var orientation: AVAudioSession.Orientation?
items.desc: The orientation of the data source relative to the device’s natural orientation.

items.name: struct AVAudioSession.Orientation
items.desc: Constants that indicate the directions in which a data source can point, relative to the device’s natural orientation.

items.name: var selectedPolarPattern: AVAudioSession.PolarPattern?
items.desc: The data source’s active polar pattern.

items.name: var supportedPolarPatterns: [AVAudioSession.PolarPattern]?
items.desc: The set of directivity configurations supported by the data source.

items.name: var preferredPolarPattern: AVAudioSession.PolarPattern?
items.desc: The preferred directivity configuration for the data source.

items.name: func setPreferredPolarPattern(AVAudioSession.PolarPattern?)
items.desc: Selects the preferred directivity configuration for the data source.

items.name: struct AVAudioSession.PolarPattern
items.desc: Constants that describe the possible polar patterns of the data source on an iOS device.
